endpoints.name: Prinsenhof Hotel
endpoints.description: Angel recommends you this 4-star boutique hotel in the heart of Groningen. Right in the shadows of the Martini Tower, its beautiful garden will offer the best cultural experience, suitable for any purpose, especially for a romantic experience <3
conditions: hotel AND (business OR leisure) AND (cultural_experience OR private OR romantic OR area_citycenter) AND NOT cheap

endpoints.name: NH Hotel de Ville, Mercure, The Student Hotel
endpoints.description: According to your requirements, Angel has found several suitable places. Opt for The Student Hotel or for the NH Hotel de Ville, if you'd like to be close to the city center or for Mercure for a more isolated option
conditions: hotel AND (business OR leisure) AND (service_breakfast_included AND bar)

endpoints.name: Martini Hotel Groningen
endpoints.description: Wonderful memories are granted if you stay here, the sweet spot of Groningen ;)
conditions: hotel AND (business OR leisure) AND (cultural_experience OR private OR romantic OR area_citycenter) AND cheap

endpoints.name: Hotel Miss Blanche
endpoints.description: The best option for you, my friend, would be this boutique hotel in the city of Groningen with luxurious and uniquely furnished rooms
conditions: hotel AND (business OR leisure) AND area_citycenter AND fine AND (romantic OR family)

endpoints.name: The Student Hotel
endpoints.description: This si the best option for you, with everything you need + the chance of extending your stay for up to a couple of months at a good price.
conditions: hotel AND (business OR leisure) AND (service_long_stay AND (area_citycenter OR service_breakfast_included OR bar))

endpoints.name: Stee in stad
endpoints.description: This is a great place for staying in with your family, a perfect location since you're close to the city center and the area is quiet and nice, all at the best price
conditions: hotel AND  leisure  AND family AND average AND service_breakfast_included OR area_korrewegwijk

endpoints.name: City Hotel
endpoints.description: This is a great place for you and your family if you want to stay in the city center at the best price
conditions: hotel AND  leisure  AND area_citycenter AND average AND service_breakfast_included AND family

endpoints.name: Mercure
endpoints.description: This hotel has all the facilities you could probably wish for, all in an isolated environment, reasonably far away from the city center crowdedness
conditions: hotel AND (business OR leisure) AND (area_rivierenbuurt OR service_breakfast_included)

endpoints.name: Bed & Breakfast 'Het Kasteeltje'
endpoints.description: I know you're on a budget, but trust me, this place will make your family feel like you've had the best vacation ever! Cosy rooms, your own kitchen and a friendly neighbourhood, what else is there to wish for?
conditions: hotel AND leisure AND (area_oosterportbuurt OR (family AND cheap))
